text: Lawrence de Awkeburne (or Laurence de Hakeburne) was a medieval Bishop of Salisbury elect. Awkeburne held the prebend of Ruscombe in the diocese of Salisbury before being elected bishop on 10 May 1288, but he died at Canterbury on 8 August 1288 before he could be consecrated.British History Online Bishops of Salisbury accessed on 30 October 2007 ==Citations== ==References== * British History Online Bishops of Salisbury accessed on 30 October 2007 Category:Bishops of Salisbury Category:1288 deaths Category:Year of birth unknown
title: Lawrence de Awkeburne
